subject: Re: [junit] Exception is swallowed inside tearDown
msgSnippet: ... Write your own test runner. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let s write software that
messageBody:
haefeleuser wrote:

> If an exception occurs in a test method, it is thrown to the JUnit
> framwork (testXyz() throws Exception).
>
> In the tearDown() method another exception occurs. The result view
> only shows the exception which occurs in tearDown(), not the one
> which occured before in the test method!
>
> If no exception occurs in tearDown(), then the exception of the test
> method appears in the result view.
>
> So the exception is swallowed by the tearDown() method.
>
> How could I prevent it from swallowing? I want that the result view
> shows both exceptions.

Write your own test runner.
--
